titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to carry out a dredging project to increase the depth of Menominee Harbor, Menomiee River, Michigan and Wisconsin, from 24 feet to 26 feet.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 4/11/2003--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to carry out the navigation project for the Menominee Harbor and River in Michigan and Wisconsin.
